title: Set alias for columns in data set but in expression builder still shows the old column name when selecting the dataset
description: When setting an alias for columns in a data set, the expression builder still displays the old column name when selecting the dataset.
OB: The expression builder shows the old column name instead of the alias when selecting the dataset in step 3.
EB: The expression builder should display the alias for the column when selecting the dataset in step 3.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a new data source and dataset.
2. Set an alias for the first column in the dataset as 'column1'.
3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset.
4. Open the expression builder and select the dataset.

Expected result: The expression builder should display the alias for the column, 'column1', when selecting the dataset.
